      42             : #define IS_RELAXNG(node, typ)                                           \
      43             :    ((node != NULL) && (node->ns != NULL) &&                          \

      45             :     (xmlStrEqual(node->name, (const xmlChar *) typ)) &&              \

     364             :     /*
     365             :      * Errors accumulated in branches may have to be stacked to be
     366             :      * provided back when it's sure they affect validation.

     381             :     /*
     382             :      * This is used for "progressive" validation
     383             :      */
     384             :     xmlRegExecCtxtPtr elem;     /* the current element regexp */

     386             :     int elemMax;                /* the max depth of elements */
     387             :     xmlRegExecCtxtPtr *elemTab; /* the stack of regexp runtime */

    1505             : /**

    1509             :  * @target:  the included target
    1510             :  * @name:  the define name to eliminate
    1511             :  *
    1512             :  * Applies the elimination algorithm of 4.7
    1513             :  *
    1514             :  * Returns 0 in case of error, 1 in case of success.
    1515             :  */
    1516             : static int
    1517           0 : xmlRelaxNGRemoveRedefine(xmlRelaxNGParserCtxtPtr ctxt,
    1518             :                          const xmlChar * URL ATTRIBUTE_UNUSED,
    1519             :                          xmlNodePtr target, const xmlChar * name)
    1520             : {
    1521           0 :     int found = 0;
    1522             :     xmlNodePtr tmp, tmp2;
    1523             :     xmlChar *name2;
    1524             : 
    1525             : #ifdef DEBUG_INCLUDE
    1526             :     if (name == NULL)
    1527             :         xmlGenericError(xmlGenericErrorContext,
    1528             :                         "Elimination of <include> start from %s\n", URL);
    1529             :     else
    1530             :         xmlGenericError(xmlGenericErrorContext,
    1531             :                         "Elimination of <include> define %s from %s\n",
    1532             :                         name, URL);
    1533             : #endif
    1534           0 :     tmp = target;
    1535           0 :     while (tmp != NULL) {
    1536           0 :         tmp2 = tmp->next;
    1537           0 :         if ((name == NULL) && (IS_RELAXNG(tmp, "start"))) {
    1538           0 :             found = 1;
    1539           0 :             xmlUnlinkNode(tmp);
    1540           0 :             xmlFreeNode(tmp);
    1541           0 :         } else if ((name != NULL) && (IS_RELAXNG(tmp, "define"))) {
    1542           0 :             name2 = xmlGetProp(tmp, BAD_CAST "name");
    1543           0 :             xmlRelaxNGNormExtSpace(name2);
    1544           0 :             if (name2 != NULL) {
    1545           0 :                 if (xmlStrEqual(name, name2)) {
    1546           0 :                     found = 1;
    1547           0 :                     xmlUnlinkNode(tmp);
    1548           0 :                     xmlFreeNode(tmp);
    1549             :                 }
    1550           0 :                 xmlFree(name2);
    1551             :             }

    1553           0 :             xmlChar *href = NULL;
    1554           0 :             xmlRelaxNGDocumentPtr inc = tmp->psvi;
    1555             : 
    1556           0 :             if ((inc != NULL) && (inc->doc != NULL) &&
    1557           0 :                 (inc->doc->children != NULL)) {

    1567           0 :                         found = 1;
    1568             :                     }

    1571             :                         xmlFree(href);
    1572             : #endif

    1574             :             }
    1575             :         }

    1581             : /**
    1582             :  * xmlRelaxNGLoadInclude:
    1583             :  * @ctxt: the parser context
    1584             :  * @URL:  the normalized URL
    1585             :  * @node: the include node.
    1586             :  * @ns:  the namespace passed from the context.
    1587             :  *
    1588             :  * First lookup if the document is already loaded into the parser context,
    1589             :  * check against recursion. If not found the resource is loaded and
    1590             :  * the content is preprocessed before being returned back to the caller.
    1591             :  *
    1592             :  * Returns the xmlRelaxNGIncludePtr or NULL in case of error
    1593             :  */
    1594             : static xmlRelaxNGIncludePtr

    2075             : 
    2076             : /**
    2077             :  * xmlRelaxNGGetErrorString:
    2078             :  * @err:  the error code
    2079             :  * @arg1:  the first string argument
    2080             :  * @arg2:  the second string argument
    2081             :  *
    2082             :  * computes a formatted error string for the given error code and args
    2083             :  *
    2084             :  * Returns the error string, it must be deallocated by the caller
    2085             :  */
    2086             : static xmlChar *
    2087           0 : xmlRelaxNGGetErrorString(xmlRelaxNGValidErr err, const xmlChar * arg1,
    2088             :                          const xmlChar * arg2)
    2089             : {
    2090             :     char msg[1000];
    2091             : 
    2092           0 :     if (arg1 == NULL)
    2093           0 :         arg1 = BAD_CAST "";
    2094           0 :     if (arg2 == NULL)
    2095           0 :         arg2 = BAD_CAST "";
    2096             : 
    2097           0 :     msg[0] = 0;
    2098           0 :     switch (err) {
    2099             :         case XML_RELAXNG_OK:
    2100             :             return (NULL);
    2101             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ERR_MEMORY:
    2102           0 :             return (xmlCharStrdup("out of memory\n"));
    2103             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ERR_TYPE:
    2104             :             snprintf(msg, 1000, "failed to validate type %s\n", arg1);
    2105             :             break;
    2106             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ERR_TYPEVAL:
    2107             :             snprintf(msg, 1000, "Type %s doesn't allow value '%s'\n", arg1,
    2108             :                      arg2);
    2109             :             break;
    2110             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ERR_DUPID:
    2111             :             snprintf(msg, 1000, "ID %s redefined\n", arg1);
    2112             :             break;
    2113             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ERR_TYPECMP:
    2114             :             snprintf(msg, 1000, "failed to compare type %s\n", arg1);
    2115             :             break;

    2565             :  * Datatype library.
    2566             :  *
    2567             :  * Returns 1 if equal, 0 if no and -1 in case of error.
    2568             :  */

    2848             : /************************************************************************
    2849             :  *                                                                      *
    2850             :  *              Compiling element content into regexp                   *
    2851             :  *                                                                      *
    2852             :  * Sometime the element content can be compiled into a pure regexp,     *
    2853             :  * This allows a faster execution and streamability at that level       *
    2854             :  *                                                                      *

    2856             : 
    2857             : /* from automata.c but not exported */

    2863             : 
    2864             : /**
    2865             :  * xmlRelaxNGIsCompileable:
    2866             :  * @define:  the definition to check
    2867             :  *
    2868             :  * Check if a definition is nullable.
    2869             :  *
    2870             :  * Returns 1 if yes, 0 if no and -1 in case of error
    2871             :  */
    2872             : static int
    2873           0 : xmlRelaxNGIsCompileable(xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr def)
    2874             : {
    2875           0 :     int ret = -1;
    2876             : 
    2877           0 :     if (def == NULL) {
    2878             :         return (-1);
    2879             :     }
    2880           0 :     if ((def->type != XML_RELAXNG_ELEMENT) &&
    2881           0 :         (def->dflags & IS_COMPILABLE))
    2882             :         return (1);
    2883           0 :     if ((def->type != XML_RELAXNG_ELEMENT) &&
    2884           0 :         (def->dflags & IS_NOT_COMPILABLE))
    2885             :         return (0);
    2886           0 :     switch (def->type) {
    2887             :         case XML_RELAXNG_NOOP:
    2888           0 :             ret = xmlRelaxNGIsCompileable(def->content);
    2889           0 :             break;
    2890             :         case XML_RELAXNG_TEXT:
    2891             :         case XML_RELAXNG_EMPTY:
    2892           0 :             ret = 1;
    2893           0 :             break;
    2894             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ELEMENT:
    2895             :             /*
    2896             :              * Check if the element content is compileable
    2897             :              */

    2899             :                 ((def->dflags & IS_COMPILABLE) == 0)) {
    2900             :                 xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr list;
    2901             : 
    2902           0 :                 list = def->content;
    2903           0 :                 while (list != NULL) {
    2904           0 :                     ret = xmlRelaxNGIsCompileable(list);
    2905           0 :                     if (ret != 1)
    2906             :                         break;
    2907           0 :                     list = list->next;
    2908             :                 }
    2909             :                 /*
    2910             :                  * Because the routine is recursive, we must guard against
    2911             :                  * discovering both COMPILABLE and NOT_COMPILABLE
    2912             :                  */
    2913           0 :                 if (ret == 0) {
    2914           0 :                     def->dflags &= ~IS_COMPILABLE;
    2915           0 :                     def->dflags |= IS_NOT_COMPILABLE;
    2916             :                 }
    2917           0 :                 if ((ret == 1) && !(def->dflags &= IS_NOT_COMPILABLE))
    2918           0 :                     def->dflags |= IS_COMPILABLE;

    2920             :                 if (ret == 1) {
    2921             :                     xmlGenericError(xmlGenericErrorContext,
    2922             :                                     "element content for %s is compilable\n",
    2923             :                                     def->name);
    2924             :                 } else if (ret == 0) {
    2925             :                     xmlGenericError(xmlGenericErrorContext,
    2926             :                                     "element content for %s is not compilable\n",
    2927             :                                     def->name);
    2928             :                 } else {
    2929             :                     xmlGenericError(xmlGenericErrorContext,
    2930             :                                     "Problem in RelaxNGIsCompileable for element %s\n",
    2931             :                                     def->name);
    2932             :                 }
    2933             : #endif
    2934             :             }

    2937             :              * are generic like anyName

    2940             :                 ret = 0;

    3012             : 
    3013             : /**
    3014             :  * xmlRelaxNGCompile:
    3015             :  * ctxt:  the RelaxNG parser context
    3016             :  * @define:  the definition tree to compile
    3017             :  *
    3018             :  * Compile the set of definitions, it works recursively, till the
    3019             :  * element boundaries, where it tries to compile the content if possible
    3020             :  *
    3021             :  * Returns 0 if success and -1 in case of error
    3022             :  */
    3023             : static int
    3024           0 : xmlRelaxNGCompile(xmlRelaxNGParserCtxtPtr ctxt, xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr def)
    3025             : {
    3026           0 :     int ret = 0;
    3027             :     xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr list;
    3028             : 
    3029           0 :     if ((ctxt == NULL) || (def == NULL))
    3030             :         return (-1);
    3031             : 
    3032           0 :     switch (def->type) {
    3033             :         case XML_RELAXNG_START:
    3034           0 :             if ((xmlRelaxNGIsCompileable(def) == 1) && (def->depth != -25)) {
    3035           0 :                 xmlAutomataPtr oldam = ctxt->am;
    3036           0 :                 xmlAutomataStatePtr oldstate = ctxt->state;
    3037             : 
    3038           0 :                 def->depth = -25;
    3039             : 
    3040           0 :                 list = def->content;
    3041           0 :                 ctxt->am = xmlNewAutomata();
    3042           0 :                 if (ctxt->am == NULL)
    3043             :                     return (-1);
    3044             : 
    3045             :                 /*
    3046             :                  * assume identical strings but not same pointer are different
    3047             :                  * atoms, needed for non-determinism detection
    3048             :                  * That way if 2 elements with the same name are in a choice
    3049             :                  * branch the automata is found non-deterministic and
    3050             :                  * we fallback to the normal validation which does the right
    3051             :                  * thing of exploring both choices.
    3052             :                  */
    3053           0 :                 xmlAutomataSetFlags(ctxt->am, 1);
    3054             : 
    3055           0 :                 ctxt->state = xmlAutomataGetInitState(ctxt->am);
    3056           0 :                 while (list != NULL) {
    3057           0 :                     xmlRelaxNGCompile(ctxt, list);
    3058           0 :                     list = list->next;
    3059             :                 }
    3060           0 :                 xmlAutomataSetFinalState(ctxt->am, ctxt->state);
    3061           0 :                 if (xmlAutomataIsDeterminist(ctxt->am))
    3062           0 :                     def->contModel = xmlAutomataCompile(ctxt->am);
    3063             : 
    3064           0 :                 xmlFreeAutomata(ctxt->am);
    3065           0 :                 ctxt->state = oldstate;
    3066           0 :                 ctxt->am = oldam;
    3067             :             }
    3068             :             break;
    3069             :         case XML_RELAXNG_ELEMENT:
    3070           0 :             if ((ctxt->am != NULL) && (def->name != NULL)) {
    3071           0 :                 ctxt->state = xmlAutomataNewTransition2(ctxt->am,
    3072             :                                                         ctxt->state, NULL,
    3073           0 :                                                         def->name, def->ns,
    3074             :                                                         def);
    3075             :             }
    3076           0 :             if ((def->dflags & IS_COMPILABLE) && (def->depth != -25)) {
    3077           0 :                 xmlAutomataPtr oldam = ctxt->am;
    3078           0 :                 xmlAutomataStatePtr oldstate = ctxt->state;
    3079             : 
    3080           0 :                 def->depth = -25;
    3081             : 
    3082           0 :                 list = def->content;
    3083           0 :                 ctxt->am = xmlNewAutomata();
    3084           0 :                 if (ctxt->am == NULL)
    3085             :                     return (-1);
    3086           0 :                 xmlAutomataSetFlags(ctxt->am, 1);
    3087           0 :                 ctxt->state = xmlAutomataGetInitState(ctxt->am);
    3088           0 :                 while (list != NULL) {
    3089           0 :                     xmlRelaxNGCompile(ctxt, list);
    3090           0 :                     list = list->next;
    3091             :                 }
    3092           0 :                 xmlAutomataSetFinalState(ctxt->am, ctxt->state);
    3093           0 :                 def->contModel = xmlAutomataCompile(ctxt->am);
    3094           0 :                 if (!xmlRegexpIsDeterminist(def->contModel)) {
    3095             : #ifdef DEBUG_COMPILE
    3096             :                     xmlGenericError(xmlGenericErrorContext,
    3097             :                         "Content model not determinist %s\n",
    3098             :                                     def->name);
    3099             : #endif
    3100             :                     /*
    3101             :                      * we can only use the automata if it is determinist
    3102             :                      */
    3103           0 :                     xmlRegFreeRegexp(def->contModel);
    3104           0 :                     def->contModel = NULL;
    3105             :                 }
    3106           0 :                 xmlFreeAutomata(ctxt->am);
    3107           0 :                 ctxt->state = oldstate;
    3108           0 :                 ctxt->am = oldam;
    3109             :             } else {
    3110           0 :                 xmlAutomataPtr oldam = ctxt->am;
    3111             : 
    3112             :                 /*
    3113             :                  * we can't build the content model for this element content
    3114             :                  * but it still might be possible to build it for some of its
    3115             :                  * children, recurse.
    3116             :                  */
    3117           0 :                 ret = xmlRelaxNGTryCompile(ctxt, def);
    3118           0 :                 ctxt->am = oldam;
    3119             :             }
    3120             :             break;
    3121             :         case XML_RELAXNG_NOOP:
    3122           0 :             ret = xmlRelaxNGCompile(ctxt, def->content);
    3123           0 :             break;
    3124             :         case XML_RELAXNG_OPTIONAL:{
    3125           0 :                 xmlAutomataStatePtr oldstate = ctxt->state;
    3126             : 
    3127           0 :                 list = def->content;
    3128           0 :                 while (list != NULL) {
    3129           0 :                     xmlRelaxNGCompile(ctxt, list);
    3130           0 :                     list = list->next;
    3131             :                 }

    3239             : /**
    3240             :  * xmlRelaxNGTryCompile:
    3241             :  * ctxt:  the RelaxNG parser context
    3242             :  * @define:  the definition tree to compile
    3243             :  *
    3244             :  * Try to compile the set of definitions, it works recursively,
    3245             :  * possibly ignoring parts which cannot be compiled.
    3246             :  *
    3247             :  * Returns 0 if success and -1 in case of error
    3248             :  */
    3249             : static int
    3250           0 : xmlRelaxNGTryCompile(xmlRelaxNGParserCtxtPtr ctxt, xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr def)
    3251             : {
    3252           0 :     int ret = 0;
    3253             :     xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr list;
    3254             : 
    3255           0 :     if ((ctxt == NULL) || (def == NULL))
    3256             :         return (-1);
    3257             : 
    3258           0 :     if ((def->type == XML_RELAXNG_START) ||
    3259             :         (def->type == XML_RELAXNG_ELEMENT)) {
    3260           0 :         ret = xmlRelaxNGIsCompileable(def);

    3262           0 :             ctxt->am = NULL;
    3263           0 :             ret = xmlRelaxNGCompile(ctxt, def);
    3264             : #ifdef DEBUG_PROGRESSIVE

    3266             :                 if (def->type == XML_RELAXNG_START)

    3268             :                                     "compiled the start\n");

    3282           0 :             return (ret);

    3358             : /**
    3359             :  * xmlRelaxNGIsNullable:

    3367           0 : xmlRelaxNGIsNullable(xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr define)

    3437             : /**
    3438             :  * xmlRelaxNGIsBlank:

    3440             :  *

    3443             :  * Returns 1 if the string is NULL or made of blanks chars, 0 otherwise

    3448           0 :     if (str == NULL)
    3449             :         return (1);
    3450           0 :     while (*str != 0) {
    3451           0 :         if (!(IS_BLANK_CH(*str)))
    3452             :             return (0);
    3453           0 :         str++;
    3454             :     }
    3455             :     return (1);
    3456             : }

    3458             : /**

    4296             : /**
    4297             :  * xmlRelaxNGComputeInterleaves:
    4298             :  * @def:  the interleave definition
    4299             :  * @ctxt:  a Relax-NG parser context
    4300             :  * @name:  the definition name
    4301             :  *
    4302             :  * A lot of work for preprocessing interleave definitions
    4303             :  * is potentially needed to get a decent execution speed at runtime
    4304             :  *   - trying to get a total order on the element nodes generated
    4305             :  *     by the interleaves, order the list of interleave definitions
    4306             :  *     following that order.
    4307             :  *   - if <text/> is used to handle mixed content, it is better to
    4308             :  *     flag this in the define and simplify the runtime checking
    4309             :  *     algorithm

    5554             : /**

    5990             :  * Returns the new prev definition
    5991             :  */
    5992             : static xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr
    5993           0 : xmlRelaxNGTryUnlink(xmlRelaxNGParserCtxtPtr ctxt ATTRIBUTE_UNUSED,

    5995             :                     xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr parent, xmlRelaxNGDefinePtr prev)

    6009           0 :             prev = cur;
    6010             :         }

    6015             : /**

    6034             :             }

    6045           0 :                 break;

    6049             :             } else

    6054           0 :                 ((parent->type == XML_RELAXNG_ONEORMORE) ||

    6063             :             } else

    6065             :         } else {

    6994             : /**
    6995             :  * xmlRelaxNGCleanupTree:

    6997             :  * @root:  an xmlNodePtr subtree
    6998             :  *
    6999             :  * Cleanup the subtree from unwanted nodes for parsing, resolve
    7000             :  * Include and externalRef lookups.
    7001             :  */
    7002             : static void
    7003           0 : xmlRelaxNGCleanupTree(xmlRelaxNGParserCtxtPtr ctxt, xmlNodePtr root)
    7004             : {
    7005             :     xmlNodePtr cur, delete;
    7006             : 
    7007           0 :     delete = NULL;
    7008           0 :     cur = root;
    7009           0 :     while (cur != NULL) {
    7010           0 :         if (delete != NULL) {
    7011           0 :             xmlUnlinkNode(delete);
    7012           0 :             xmlFreeNode(delete);
    7013           0 :             delete = NULL;
    7014             :         }
    7015           0 :         if (cur->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) {
    7016             :             /*
    7017             :              * Simplification 4.1. Annotations
    7018             :              */
    7019           0 :             if ((cur->ns == NULL) ||
    7020           0 :                 (!xmlStrEqual(cur->ns->href, xmlRelaxNGNs))) {
    7021           0 :                 if ((cur->parent != NULL) &&
    7022           0 :                     (cur->parent->type == XML_ELEMENT_NODE) &&
    7023           0 :                     ((xmlStrEqual(cur->parent->name, BAD_CAST "name")) ||
    7024           0 :                      (xmlStrEqual(cur->parent->name, BAD_CAST "value")) ||

    7968             : /**

    7979           0 : xmlRelaxNGValidateCompiledContent(xmlRelaxNGValidCtxtPtr ctxt,

    7991             :                              xmlRelaxNGValidateCompiledCallback, ctxt);
    7992           0 :     ctxt->perr = 0;
    7993           0 :     cur = content;

    7995           0 :         ctxt->state->seq = cur;

    7999           0 :                 if (xmlIsBlankNode(cur))

    8003           0 :                     VALID_ERR2(XML_RELAXNG_ERR_TEXTWRONG,
    8004             :                                cur->parent->name);
    8005             :                 }

    8013             :                 }

    8015           0 :                     VALID_ERR2(XML_RELAXNG_ERR_ELEMWRONG, cur->name);
    8016             :                 }
    8017             :                 break;
    8018             :             default:
    8019             :                 break;
    8020             :         }
    8021           0 :         if (ret < 0)
    8022             :             break;

    8027             :     }

    8032           0 :     } else if (ret == 0) {

    8035             :          */
    8036           0 :         VALID_ERR2(XML_RELAXNG_ERR_NOELEM, BAD_CAST "");
    8037           0 :         ret = -1;
    8038           0 :         if ((ctxt->flags & FLAGS_IGNORABLE) == 0)
    8039           0 :             xmlRelaxNGDumpValidError(ctxt);

    8529             : /**

    8533             :  *

    8536             :  *
    8537             :  * Returns the new string or NULL in case of error.
    8538             :  */
    8539             : static xmlChar *
    8540           0 : xmlRelaxNGNormalize(xmlRelaxNGValidCtxtPtr ctxt, const xmlChar * str)

    8542             :     xmlChar *ret, *p;
    8543             :     const xmlChar *tmp;
    8544             :     int len;
    8545             : 
    8546           0 :     if (str == NULL)
    8547             :         return (NULL);
    8548             :     tmp = str;
    8549           0 :     while (*tmp != 0)
    8550           0 :         tmp++;
    8551           0 :     len = tmp - str;
    8552             :

    9605             : /**

    9718             : /**
    9719             :  * xmlRelaxNGBestState:
    9720             :  * @ctxt:  a Relax-NG validation context
    9721             :  *
    9722             :  * Find the "best" state in the ctxt->states list of states to report
    9723             :  * errors about. I.e. a state with no element left in the child list
    9724             :  * or the one with the less attributes left.
    9725             :  * This is called only if a falidation error was detected
    9726             :  *
    9727             :  * Returns the index of the "best" state or -1 in case of error
    9728             :  */
    9729             : static int
    9730           0 : xmlRelaxNGBestState(xmlRelaxNGValidCtxtPtr ctxt)
    9731             : {
    9732             :     xmlRelaxNGValidStatePtr state;
    9733             :     int i, tmp;
    9734           0 :     int best = -1;
    9735           0 :     int value = 1000000;
    9736             : 
    9737           0 :     if ((ctxt == NULL) || (ctxt->states == NULL) ||
    9738           0 :         (ctxt->states->nbState <= 0))
    9739             :         return (-1);
    9740             : 
    9741           0 :     for (i = 0; i < ctxt->states->nbState; i++) {
    9742           0 :         state = ctxt->states->tabState[i];
    9743           0 :         if (state == NULL)
    9744           0 :             continue;
    9745           0 :         if (state->seq != NULL) {
    9746           0 :             if ((best == -1) || (value > 100000)) {
    9747           0 :                 value = 100000;
    9748           0 :                 best = i;
    9749             :             }
    9750             :         } else {
    9751           0 :             tmp = state->nbAttrLeft;
    9752           0 :             if ((best == -1) || (value > tmp)) {
    9753           0 :                 value = tmp;
    9754           0 :                 best = i;
    9755             :             }
    9756             :         }
    9757             :     }
    9758             :     return (best);
    9759             : }

   10593             : /**

   10816             : /**
   10817             :  * xmlRelaxNGCleanPSVI:
   10818             :  * @node:  an input element or document
   10819             :  *
   10820             :  * Call this routine to speed up XPath computation on static documents.
   10821             :  * This stamps all the element nodes with the document order
   10822             :  * Like for line information, the order is kept in the element->content
   10823             :  * field, the value stored is actually - the node number (starting at -1)
   10824             :  * to be able to differentiate from line numbers.
   10825             :  *
   10826             :  * Returns the number of elements found in the document or -1 in case
   10827             :  *    of error.
   10828             :  */

   10831             :     xmlNodePtr cur;
   10832             : 
   10833           0 :     if ((node == NULL) ||

   10844           0 :             cur->psvi = NULL;

   10846           0 :                 cur = cur->children;

   10848             :             }

   10851           0 :             cur = cur->next;
